title: Crash 'N' Burn [PC Game]
description:
Crash 'N' Burn (2004) [En/Ru] (1.0) RePack by Ma2012ks


Language: English, Russian

Version: 1.0.0.0


Description:

Brake pedal - for wimps. Piles of crumpled metal - all that remains from the losers. This is not a competition and not a sport. It is a war in the first place. Squeeze gas, cut in the afterburner. There are no rules. Your task - to survive in a frantic race steel hurricane, sweeping away everything in its path. It - Crash 'N' Burn!

Features:

- Choose one of the 4 types of cars - the sparkling Pickup Truck, powerful Muscle Car, Sports Coupe or rapid nimble Hot Hatch.

- Opponents 15 - 15 roaring metal monsters.

- You will not find friends in the underground tracks and racing stadiums Miami, San Francisco, Los Angeles and New York.

- First place at any cost: reset competitors off the track, spread the steel on their bumpers, tear to pieces the body. Leave behind a flaming wreckage and black soot melting tires.

- Winner takes all - money to upgrade your car and new game modes.

- Turn your steel horse in this beast! At your disposal all the means of tuning - from stylish spoilers to massive bumpers and metal to enhance the rigidity of the body.

- Multiple game modes - from races for survival to "play on slabachka": Race, Team Race Kamikaze, Team Kamikaze, Running Man, Last Man Standing, Assassination and Bomb Tag. You never get tired of smash and burn!

- Damage model is unique - you will see tearing and burning rubber tires defeated auto engines.

- Each circle track - this recent car wrecks, oil spills, burning pools of fuel.

- Want to see check again? Nothing could be easier - you have a camera that will help prolong the pleasure of complete superiority on the road.

Features of Release:

Good performance
Additional software (DirectX, Microsoft Visual C ++ Redist 32/64 bit)
Bilingual installer (English / Russian) with Original Game Soundtrack and Slideshow
Installation 5-7 minutes


Minimum configuration:
Microsoft Windows 8 / Se7en / Vista / XP
CPU SSE2 2.4 GHz, RAM 2 Gb
VRAM 512 Mb, DirectX 10.0c, Shader Model 2.0
HDD 3,50 Gb

Test Configuration:
Windows 7 x64 Maximum Service Pack 1
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (with the latest drivers)
12 Gb RAM
AMD Phenom || X2 550 3.10 GHz



Installing and running

Installation:

1. Mount the disk image in Daemon Tools or similar supporting mount a virtual drive disk image format iso. 
2. Install the game, following the instructions of the program-setup. 
3. Play! 

Additionally:

At the start menu ("Press START Button") - press Enter, to enter the game.
Recommended read the readme file.
